Package gw.api.claim

Class ReopenUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.claim.ReopenUtil
public class ReopenUtil extends Object
Utilities for reopening Claims, Exposures or Matters
Author:
pyoung

  • Method Summary

    reopenClaimWithoutExplanation(Claim claim)

  • Method Details

    • requireExplanation

      public static boolean requireExplanation(IEntityType entityType)
      Checks if entities of the given type require an explanation before they can be reopened. If this method returns true then the UI should show a popup window where the user enters an explanation before reopening the entity. If this method returns then the UI should just reopen entities of this type as soon as the button or menu is clicked, without any confirmation.
      Parameters:
      entityType - the entity type
      Returns:
      true if this entity type requires an explanation before reopening, false otherwise

    • reopenClaimWithoutExplanation

      public static void reopenClaimWithoutExplanation(Claim claim)
      Reopens the given claim without any explanation - used if the system is configured to omit the reopen claim popup and just reopen the claim when a menu item or button is clicked.

      Warning; this method does not handle the case where the reopen claim validation rules generate warnings, but no errors. If this happens the reopen will fail (as it should) but retrying the reopen will not succeed. If you need to use warnings in reopen claim validation rules then the reopen claim popup should be used

      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to be reopened

    • reopenExposureWithoutExplanation

      public static void reopenExposureWithoutExplanation(Exposure exposure)
      Reopens the given exposure without any explanation - used if the system is configured to omit the reopen exposure popup and just reopen the exposure when a menu item or button is clicked.

      Warning; this method does not handle the case where the reopen exposure validation rules generate warnings, but no errors. If this happens the reopen will fail (as it should) but retrying the reopen will not succeed. If you need to use warnings in reopen exposure validation rules then the reopen exposure popup should be used

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure to be reopened

    • reopenMatterWithoutExplanation

      public static void reopenMatterWithoutExplanation(Matter matter)
      Reopens the given matter without any explanation - used if the system is configured to omit the reopen matter popup and just reopen the matter when a menu item or button is clicked.

      Warning; this method does not handle the case where the reopen matter validation rules generate warnings, but no errors. If this happens the reopen will fail (as it should) but retrying the reopen will not succeed. If you need to use warnings in reopen matter validation rules then the reopen matter popup should be used

      Parameters:
      matter - the matter to be reopened
